pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for CC Sabathia; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .245 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .277 off him after that.

pitch.cc: CC Sabathia has thrown 89 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 95 over the past 10 pitches.
CC Sabathia is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.

pitch.cc: CC Sabathia didn't stick to the scouting report; Matt LaPorta is hitting .429 this season against four-seam fastballs in that location.
